    • renderBackground

      protected void renderBackground(Renderer renderer)
      Renders the background of this screen. By default, renders a transparent background if the world is loaded, otherwise renders a solid background.
      Parameters:
      renderer - renderer to draw/render with.

    • onClose

      public boolean onClose(Screen next)
      Called when this screen is closing.
      Parameters:
      next - screen to go to after this screen is closed.
      Returns:
      true to continue to the next screen, false otherwise.

    • onClosed
